Comment.Language: For the Entrance of the Lord Christ into the Land of Egypt from the Feast of the Ascension of our Lord to the 49th day of the Pentecost Period:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. Pi,~rictoc aftwnf e~bolqen n/eymwout: ouoh afsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui: afhemci caouinam m~pefiwt: afi~ e~qoun e~p~kahi n~,/mi: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Christ is risen from the dead and has ascended into the heavens, and is seated at the right hand of His Father; entered into the land of Egypt. Alleluia, Alleluia.
الليلويا الليلويا المسيح قام من الأموات، وصعد إلي السموات وجلس عن يمين ابيه، دخل إلي أرض مصر. الليلويا الليلويا.
